p: In this way, we first clustered the 182 case cities into four groups using each cityâ€™s manufacturing structure. The cluster analysis results show that group 1 included 22 cities with more energy production enterprises, group 2 included 41 cities with higher ranking in heavy manufacturing, and group 3 included 65 cities that relied more on light manufacturing. The remaining 54 cities were grouped together in group 4 (high-tech).
